name: Cypress FX2 Utils
description: An utility for Cypress FX2 based devices. Useful for backup/recovery of the firmware, tests, low level code analyse/optimization and diagnosis.  You can: - Read and save the EEPROM data.  - Write a firmware in the EEPROM (full version). - Analyse the firmware with a specific ASM decompiler (full version).   Attention: requires USB OTG. Use only with Cypress FX2 chipset.
